## Imports

```{r}
library(vdemdata)
library(dplyr)
library(skimr)
vdem <- vdem
```

## Data Processing
###  Data Examination

```{r}
vdem %>% 
  select(contains('v2elsnlfc_1')) %>%
  head()
```

### Data Filtering

```{r}
vdem_subset <- vdem %>%
  filter(country_name == "Bangladesh" | 
           country_name == "Philippines" |
           country_name == "Pakistan" |
           country_name == "United States of America") %>%
  select(country_name, 
         year, 
         v2x_frassoc_thick,
         v2xel_frefair,
         v2x_freexp_altinf,
         v2x_elecoff,
         v2x_suffr) %>%
  filter(year >= 1971)
```
